description: Subsets of an 8-element set in order by number of elements in each subset.
comments: Subsets are represented by binary vectors.More generally the main diagonal of the array defined by T(0,j)=j+1 j>=0, T(i,0)=i+1 i>=0, T(i,j)=T(i-1,j-1)+T(i-1,j)+ A, is given by T(n,n)=2^(n-1)*(n+2A+2)-A - _Benoit Cloitre_, Jun 17 2003
links: J. Loughry, Efficiently Enumerating the Subsets of a Set
formula: Main diagonal of the array defined by T(0, j)=j+1 j>=0, T(i, 0)=i+1 i>=0, T(i, j)=T(i-1, j-1)+T(i-1, j)+ 7; a(n)=2^(n-1)*(n+16)-7 - _Benoit Cloitre_, Jun 17 2003
author: Joe Loughry (loughry(AT)uswest.net)
